entities.description: Specific response categories displayed for data collection in the survey.
Percentage of missing data in the survey response categories.
Total number of cases in the survey.
Date when the data was recovered as recorded in the survey.

relationships.description: Indicates the response categories available in the survey data.
Represents the amount of missing data in the survey's response categories.
Shows the total number of valid cases recorded in the survey.
Specifies the date when the survey data was recovered.
